text: Berry Gordy Jr. (born November 28, 1929) is an American entrepreneur and producer. He founded Motown Records. He is associated with musical acts, such as Smokey Robinson, Diana Ross, The Supremes, and Stevie Wonder. His son Kennedy Gordon was signed to Motown. Gordy was born in Detroit. ==References== Category:African-American musicians Category:American R&B; musicians Category:Musicians from Detroit Category:1929 births Category:Living people
title: Berry Gordy
